name: Stationary Forehand-Backhand
step_by_step: Move puck forehand to backhand in front of body
coaching_cues: Soft hands, relaxed grip, head up

name: Wide Reach Stickhandling
step_by_step: Reach puck wide forehand and backhand
coaching_cues: Extend arms, control puck, head up

name: Figure 8 Around Feet
step_by_step: Move puck in figure 8 around feet

name: Single-Leg Stickhandling
step_by_step: Stickhandle while balancing on one leg

name: Front Pull Push
step_by_step: Pull puck in, push it out repeatedly
coaching_cues: Use wrists not arms, head up

name: Backhand Only Control
step_by_step: Stickhandle on backhand side of body

name: Wide Pull Push
step_by_step: Pull puck wide then push across body

name: Quick Touch Triangle
step_by_step: Move puck in triangle pattern

name: Toe Drag Hold
step_by_step: Toe drag puck and hold position

name: Pull-Push Shuffle
step_by_step: Shuffle laterally while pull-pushing puck

name: Side-to-Side Reach
step_by_step: Reach puck side to side at full width

name: Quick Hands In Place
step_by_step: Rapid small touches in front of body

name: Pull-Behind Feet
step_by_step: Pull puck behind feet side to side

name: Stationary Toe Drags
step_by_step: Repeated toe drags side to side

name: Forward Walk Stickhandle
step_by_step: Walk forward while stickhandling

name: Backward Walk Stickhandle
step_by_step: Walk backward while controlling puck

name: Reaction Call Stickhandle
step_by_step: Change direction on verbal cue

name: Lateral Shuffle Stickhandle
step_by_step: Lateral shuffle while stickhandling

name: Toe Drag Pull Push Combo
step_by_step: Toe drag then pull-push across body

name: Quick Hands Wide Narrow
step_by_step: Alternate wide and narrow touches

name: Lateral Cross Step Handle
step_by_step: Crossover steps while stickhandling

name: Stickhandle Two Objects
step_by_step: Stick handle two balls/pucks and control each independently

name: Toe Drag to Wide Push
step_by_step: Toe drag then push puck wide explosively

name: Continuous Figure 8
step_by_step: Continuous figure 8 at higher speed

name: Forward-Backward Walk Handle
step_by_step: Walk forward then backward while handling

name: Wide Reach Toe Drags
step_by_step: Wide reach toe drags side to side

name: Around the World Stickhandling
step_by_step: Move puck around entire body starting forehand and returning to forehand

name: Backhand Toe Drag Control
step_by_step: Perform repeated backhand toe drags maintaining control

name: Pull Through Legs Kick to Forehand
step_by_step: Pull puck through legs and kick it out to forehand

name: Pull Through Legs Kick to Backhand
step_by_step: Pull puck through legs and kick it out to backhand

name: Pull Through Legs Straight to Forehand
step_by_step: Pull puck through legs directly to forehand

name: Pull Through Legs Straight to Backhand
step_by_step: Pull puck through legs directly to backhand

name: Toe Drag into Puck Protection
step_by_step: Toe drag puck then shift body to protect it
coaching_cues: Use body between puck and defender

name: Wide Backhand Protection Control
step_by_step: Move puck wide across body into backhand protection

name: Deceptive Fake Pass Combo
step_by_step: Fake pass, quick stickhandles, second deceptive fake

name: Single-Leg Stickhandling "Around the World"
step_by_step: Stickhandle around the entire body while balancing on one leg

name: Single-Leg Hop Over Line
step_by_step: Hop over a line on one leg while controlling puck

name: Single-Leg Forward Hop Handle
step_by_step: Hop forward on one leg while stickhandling

name: Single-Leg Backward Hop Handle
step_by_step: Hop backward on one leg while controlling puck

name: Iron Cross Movement Handle
step_by_step: Move forward/backward and laterally in cross pattern while handling

name: Quick-Wide-Quick Handle Series
step_by_step: Quick forehand touches, one wide move, quick backhand touches

name: Head-Up Puck Protection Hold
step_by_step: Protect puck on forehand or backhand while keeping head up and scanning

name: Head-Up Wide Reach Protection
step_by_step: Move puck wide across body while maintaining protection and eyes up

name: Protection with Visual Callouts
step_by_step: Protect puck while responding to visual or verbal cues

name: Protection with Shoulder Checks
step_by_step: Protect puck while performing quick shoulder checks

name: Single-Leg Plate Push (Hughes)
step_by_step: Stand on one leg. Place the knob of the stick into the plate hole/edge and push the plate back and forth on the ground under control. Switch legs halfway.
coaching_cues: Stay tall, knee stable, smooth pushes, don’t rush

name: BOSU Stickhandling
step_by_step: Stand on BOSU (both feet) in athletic stance and perform continuous forehand-backhand handling.
coaching_cues: Soft hands, quiet feet, keep chest tall

name: BOSU Single-Leg Stickhandling
step_by_step: Stand on BOSU on one leg and stickhandle continuously. Switch legs halfway.
coaching_cues: Hips level, knee stable, small touches first

name: Banded Around-the-World Stickhandling
step_by_step: With knees bent and band tension, move puck around entire body (front, sides, behind) while maintaining control.
coaching_cues: Keep head up, move hips not shoulders, stay low

name: Double Stick Crossovers + Front Handling
step_by_step: Lay two sticks on the ground. Perform crossover footwork over the sticks while stickhandling in front both directions.
coaching_cues: Feet quiet, hands faster than feet, eyes up

name: Skater Jumps Over Double Stick + Handle
step_by_step: With two sticks on ground, perform skater jumps over the sticks while maintaining continuous stickhandling.
coaching_cues: Stick landings, keep puck in front, don’t lose posture

name: Weight-Shifting Wide Stickhandles
step_by_step: Wide forehand/backhand touches while shifting weight side to side each touch.
coaching_cues: Hips shift with puck, stay low, soft hands

name: Mid-Lunge Quadrant Handles
step_by_step: Hold a mid-lunge. Keep puck on one side only and stickhandle from front to back range without crossing centerline.
coaching_cues: Sit into hips, long reach, control the puck at end ranges

name: Partner Sweep Constraint Stickhandling
step_by_step: Partner sweeps a stick back and forth on the ground while athlete stickhandles around the moving obstacle continuously.
coaching_cues: Head up, anticipate sweep, keep touches small and quick

name: Smiley Area Stickhandling
step_by_step: Set two pucks and a flat marker like a “smiley face” area. Use the full area to stickhandle (circles, diagonals, figure patterns).
coaching_cues: Use whole space, eyes up, stay relaxed

name: Figure-8 Puck Flicks
equipment: Stick, puck, extra stick (optional as gates)
step_by_step: Stickhandle in a figure-8 pattern and lift/flick the puck slightly each time you come around the turn.
coaching_cues: Soft catch, don’t slap, control landing

name: Heavy Plate Figure-8 Stickhandling
step_by_step: Using a wood stick, control a metal plate in a figure-8 pattern with smooth continuous touches.
coaching_cues: Grip light, wrists active, no bouncing the plate

name: One-Handed Weighted Backhand Extension
step_by_step: One hand on stick. Stickhandle a plate on the backhand side at full extension with controlled touches.
coaching_cues: Shoulder down, wrist strong, control at end range

name: Stickhandle Under Stick Gate
equipment: Stick, puck, extra stick + 3 pucks (as risers)
step_by_step: Place a stick elevated on 3 pucks to form a gate. Stickhandle on the line under the stick without hitting it.
coaching_cues: Keep hands low, small touches, head up

name: Concrete Plate Push (Bedard)
step_by_step: Using the end of the stick, move the plate around on concrete in controlled patterns (forward/back, circles, figure-8).
coaching_cues: Quiet shoulders, smooth pressure, don’t chatter the plate

name: No-Crossover Double Stick Side-Step Handling
step_by_step: Stickhandle back and forth while side-stepping over two sticks (no crossovers). Optional: coach flashes fingers and athlete calls number.
coaching_cues: Feet under hips, keep puck moving, eyes up and scan

name: Side-to-Side Shuffle Handling Over Sticks
step_by_step: Stickhandle while shuffling side to side across the two sticks repeatedly.
coaching_cues: Stay low, fast feet, hands stay calm

name: Curtsey Crossover Handling Over Two Sticks
step_by_step: Perform curtsey crossover footwork over two sticks while maintaining continuous stickhandling in front.
coaching_cues: Hips square, control depth, don’t reach for puck
